mapper.sql: sceneName, source, sceneType, riskType, roadType, laneNum, apolloScore, downloadLink
mapper.insert: insert into scene (sceneName, source, sceneType, riskType, roadType, laneNum, apolloScore, downloadLink) values (#{scenename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{source,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{scenetype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{risktype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{roadtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lanenum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{apolloscore,jdbcType=REAL}, #{downloadlink,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into scene
sceneName,
source,
sceneType,
riskType,
roadType,
laneNum,
apolloScore,
downloadLink,

mapper.update:
update scene
source = #{source,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sceneType = #{scenetype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
riskType = #{risktype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
roadType = #{roadtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
laneNum = #{lanenum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
apolloScore = #{apolloscore,jdbcType=REAL},
downloadLink = #{downloadlink,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where sceneName = #{scenename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update scene set source = #{source,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sceneType = #{scenetype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, riskType = #{risktype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, roadType = #{roadtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, laneNum = #{lanenum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, apolloScore = #{apolloscore,jdbcType=REAL}, downloadLink = #{downloadlink,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where sceneName = #{scenename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
